item.description:
The movie starts at 7:45, so lets meetup at 7:15. I found out that the movie will be playing upstairs....so I will be waiting in the concession area near the coffee vendor at the top of the escalators. I will try to snag a table, if not, I will be standing in the area.
I will be wearing a badge so new people can recognize me.

See you there!


Catch the TRAILER:
http://movies.yahoo.c...

Stephen King's The Mist

Starring: Thomas Jane, Marcia Gay Harden, Andre Braugher, Laurie Holden, Toby Jones, William Sadler, Frances Sternhagen, Jeffrey DeMunn

web site:

http://www.themist-mo...

Plot Summary: Three-time OscarÂ®-nominee Frank Darabont ("The Green Mile," "The Shawshank Redemption") reunites with horror-master Stephen King to write and direct this chilling adaptation of the author's original short story. Following a violent thunderstorm, artist David Drayton and a small town community come under vicious attack from creatures prowling in a thick and unnatural mist. Local rumors point to an experiment called the 'The Arrowhead Project' conducted at a nearby top-secret military base, but questions as to the origins of the deadly vapor are secondary to the group's overall chances for survival. Retreating to a local supermarket, Drayton and the survivors must face-off against each other before taking a united stand against an enemy they cannot even see!
item.name: Stephen King's The Mist
